Class HW6_zfergus2.Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • HW6_zfergus2.Texture
  • Enclosing class:
    HW6_zfergus2

    public static class HW6_zfergus2.Texture
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for opening and reading byte data from an image file. Stores data and properties of the image in memory.
    Author:
    Zachary Ferguson
